DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying tissue sample patient cancer laboratory may help doctor learn change occur DNA identify biomarkers related cancer . It may also help doctor find good way treat cancer . PURPOSE : This research trial study protein expression sample young patient rhabdomyosarcoma .
DOC.brief_title: Protein Expression Samples From Young Patients With Rhabdomyosarcoma
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To measure protein expression candidate proteins human rhabdomyosarcoma ( RMS ) tumor sample . OUTLINE : Archived tumor tissue sample analyze protein expression ( i.e. , Notch1 , Hey1 , FGFR4 , Sp1 ) IHC techniques standard commercially available antibody . Candidate proteins correlate patient age , gender , rhabdomyosarcoma ( RMS ) tumor stage , RMS tumor subtype .
